page.title: 03FERRYBOAT MEN
page.content: The Galloway Princess is a 7000 ton ferry which carries containers, lorries, caravans, cars, livestock and people from Stranraer, in Scotland, to Larne, in Ireland, 3 times a day.She has the capacity to carry and seat 1001 passengers and at a speed of 19 knots can complete the 33 mile joiurney in 2 hours and 15 minutes.The crew number approximately 60. From interviewing the crew we found out that they work 24 hours on followed by 48 hours off. They don't mind working either day or night shift, or crossing the same sea route over and over again. Some occasionally get sea sick, and some occaionally, but very rarely miss the boat!
